entry.title: Justice in Life or Justice in Death? (DISCONTINUED)
entry.summary:
Author: Wolfer13579

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,549Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 47

Summary: 2.5 years after Jason Todd-Smith disappeared and believed dead, and Stephanie Brown has tried to move on, only to get her heart broken again. Trying to distract herself, she goes on patrol more often, and finds herself interested in Gotham’s newest vigilante. There’s only one problem; this new vigilante hates the Bats, and would rather see them dead, along with most of Gotham’s Rogues. Who is this man, and why does he choose to make Spoiler an exception from the group of vigilantes he wants dead? Takes place 6 months after the ending of Jason Todd-Smith. (Discontinued)

entry.title: Like I Lived My Whole Life Before The First Light
entry.summary:
Author: Asexual_Sexual

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,440Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 21

Summary: How do you learn to love when you spent your teens years undead and training with assassins? How do you explain your need for affection and praise without brining up your abusive dad and ex-boyfriend? Is it really that serious to only ever have been in one romantic relationship when you were 13? Is it wrong to date your ex-high-school sweethearts brother that tried to kill him? Why does it all come back to daddy issues? I can’t answer all those question but I’ll sure as hell make these two suffer for it! Hopefully a romantic/comedic assessment of these characters with a little angst squeezed in because what’s life without it.
